name: qwertyuiop (perplelolyt)
description:
qwertyuiop

a game made by me at 1am

plot

you are a green rectangle with no purpose, spawned into a world of weird geometrical shapes, and i'm writing this at 2am thinking im the best poet ever. 

gameplay

inspired by games like "world's hardest game" and "super meat boy", this game has fluid and smooth-ish gameplay with challenging/unfair level design to make a high-movement skill-based platformer.

art style

and that concludes the artstyle segment

NOTE: This game is still in a very early state, a lot of things (gameplay, art, level design) are subject to change.
